column2: BP buys New Mexico oil and gas assets from Devon Energy HOUSTON
column3: Dec 18 BP Plc on Friday said its U.S. onshore unit has acquired all of Devon Energy Corp's  oil and gas properties in the San Juan Basin in New Mexico for an undisclosed price.
